data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ingush, Russia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ingush, Russia

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Ingush, Russia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Ingush, Russia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,310 believers in the state of Ingush to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Altai people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Altai people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Altai people is yours.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Ingush to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, the believers in the state of Ingush, Russia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,310 believers in Ingush to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Ingush
location.people_groups_list: Akhvakh, Arab, Uzbeki, Adyghe, Yazidi, Akkin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Akhvakh (6,800), Arab, Uzbeki (9,800), Adyghe (142,000), Yazidi (41,000), Akkin (104,000)
